name: Tennisplätze Hotel Berghof
description:
Make time to enjoy an invigorating game of tennis on one of our 4 outdoor courts open daily in summer from 8am – 7pm.

The 2 hard courts (carpet with rubber granules) in our tennis hall as well as our squash court offer a good alternative if the weather doesn’t play ball!

Keep fit and make the most of the following facilities offered free of charge to our guests;

    outdoor tennis courts
    tennis hall from 8am-4pm (only winter)
    squash court

 

Prices for external guests:

1 hour outdoor tennis court € 10,- or in the tennis hall € 16,-
1 hour squash € 10,-
